title: Secretary-General's message for the opening ceremony of the First World Indigenous Games (UN - United ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations) Secretary-General 's message for the opening ceremony of the First World Indigenous Games Palmas, Tocantins , Brazil , 23 October 2015 I am pleased to convey my greetings to all those gathered for the opening
